``` python
dg0.face_t.project(
    subjs=[65],
    features=['kurtosis', 'skew'],
    fbands=[0,1,2,3],
    wdfactory=wfactory('db4',8),
    pcfactory=pca2,
).plot_lagged_correlations(
    twin=250,
    step=25,
    max_lag=250,
    n_jobs=8
)
```

![](lagged_ccorr_files/figure-commonmark/cell-3-output-1.png)
